title: Spacious One Bed W/Parking+LAUNDRY IN UNIT-Small Dog Ok-8/1!
posting_body: Pet: Cats and Small Dogs are Negotiable
Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water AND ONE OFF STREET PARKING SPACE
Parking::1 off-street parking space is included in the rent
Spacious one bedroom in an unbelievable Brookline location, steps away from the D train and close to Brookline Village, Washington Square and Coolidge Corner-available 8/1!
This beautiful unit features newly finished hardwood floors, fresh paint throughout, a nicely updated kitchen and bath, Tons of closet space and LAUNDRY IN THE UNIT!
Monthly rent includes heat and hot water and small dogs will be considered.
For further information and showings call Heidi at 617-699-4568!
